display_long_description:
# 🌋 The Volcanic Crossroads Update is Here! 🌋
Race through scorching magma in the new stage: Volcanic Crossroads!

It's a massive multiplayer climb-battle stage!
All players who reach the goal earn a Silver Aura, and the top 10 climbers will be rewarded with a Gold Aura!

Each stage features 3 sets of branching paths plus a final route, giving you 7 total paths to conquer!

Hurry… or get burned by the other players!
Climb to the top and claim victory!


**This game is a challenge for all VR gamers who love physics and brain teasers.**
For VR gamers who are strong in both mind and arm... see you at the top!
[media]

# 💪Your hands are crowbars—ready to start climbing💪

In Crowbar Climber, use your crowbars to make your way up!
Face hooks, planks, and gears using only your arms.
Can you beat the game before you run out of energy?

[media]

# 🧗‍♂️Master the art of climbing through physics!🧗‍♀️

Control your environment and body using a crowbar that reacts to every move.
Grab hooks at the last second, launch yourself with powerful swings, and cling to ledges in creative ways.

[media]

# 📸Share your gameplay videos with friends!🎥

Record both first-person and third-person perspectives, just like in the promo video.

Show off your crowbar-climbing skills to friends or share on social media.


[media]

It's a massive multiplayer climb-battle stage!

# 💪Your hands are crowbars—ready to start climbing💪

In Crowbar Climber, use your crowbars to make your way up!
Face hooks, planks, and gears using only your arms.
Can you beat the game before you run out of energy?

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974783_1245640976757644_6511698305735211905_n.mp4?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=yKjqjZOrZYsQ7kNvwH1pI6S&_nc_oc=AdnvoE39csMfjKDV_8M56EgyO-vUkX_kS91ei-K7s5OKJn9Xv6CLY1AM7IxyMNZk4uw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=e9bIABlI3JUqppsWLr4ipg&oh=00_AfksNHEZbi0pjpl1IahejBRFPSTVifSZfOvDTr60qY6ZkQ&oe=6959B797)

# 🧗‍♂️Master the art of climbing through physics!🧗‍♀️

Control your environment and body using a crowbar that reacts to every move.
Grab hooks at the last second, launch yourself with powerful swings, and cling to ledges in creative ways.

# 📸Share your gameplay videos with friends!🎥

Record both first-person and third-person perspectives, just like in the promo video.

Show off your crowbar-climbing skills to friends or share on social media.
